constituent: status quo, turtle, chihuahua, dog, large, drop
heisigStory: Did you ever hear of the turtle who fell madly in love with a chihuahua but could not have her because their two families did not like the idea of their children intermarrying? Like all classic stories of ill-fated love, this one shows how the young upset the status quo with an emotion older and more powerful than anything their elders have devised to counter it: blind love.
koohiiStory1: It was left to the turtle to make right with the dog and thus maintain the status quo..
koohiiStory2: A turtle mounting a chihuahua clearly disrupts the status quo.
myStory: trạng thái. chó đứng chó ngồi
words: present condition, existing state, status quo
state of affairs (around you), situation, circumstances
current status, condition, situation, circumstances, state
